trans-unit.source: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink"></xref> Web server control.
trans-unit.target: Fornece suporte de tempo de criação num designer visual para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink"> </xref> Web controlo de servidor.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control creates a link for the client browser to navigate to another Web page.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>controlo cria uma ligação para o browser do cliente navegar para outra página Web.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>

trans-unit.source: In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup source code that describes a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Um designer visual, quando muda de origem para a vista de estrutura, o código de origem do markup que descreve um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>controlo é analisado e uma versão de tempo de criação do controlo é criada na superfície de desenho.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>

trans-unit.source: When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control is persisted to the markup source code and edited into the markup for the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Quando voltar a mudar para vista de origem, o controlo de tempo de criação é transferido para o código de origem do markup e editá-lo na marcação de página Web.

trans-unit.source: The HyperLinkDesigner class provides design-time support for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe de HyperLinkDesigner fornece suporte de momento da conceção para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method returns the markup that is used to render the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control at design time.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>método devolve a marcação que é utilizada para compor associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>controlo no momento da concepção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> method is called when there is a change to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>método é chamado quando existe uma alteração para o controlo associado.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner> class when it creates the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control or a copy of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O .NET Framework constrói internamente uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner>classe quando cria associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>controlo ou uma cópia do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>controlo da superfície de desenho.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.HyperLinkDesigner>

trans-unit.source: Gets the markup that is used to render the associated control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a marcação que é utilizada para compor o controlo associado no momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeHtml method generates the design-time markup for the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control.
trans-unit.target: O método GetDesignTimeHtml gera a marcação de momento da conceção para associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>

trans-unit.source: The method first saves local copies of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.NavigateUrl%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A> properties, as well as the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> child collection.
trans-unit.target: O método guarda primeiro cópias locais do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.NavigateUrl%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A>Propriedades, bem como o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>coleção subordinada.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.ImageUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.NavigateUrl%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink.Text%2A>

trans-unit.source: It provides default values for these properties if the original values are `null` or blank.
trans-unit.target: Fornece os valores predefinidos para estas propriedades, se os valores originais `null` ou em branco.

trans-unit.source: The GetDesignTimeHtml method then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TextControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> base method to generate the markup and restores the properties and child control collection to their original values, if necessary.
trans-unit.target: Em seguida, chama o método GetDesignTimeHtml o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TextControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>base método para gerar a marcação e restaura as propriedades e a coleção de controlos subordinados para os valores originais, se necessário.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TextControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>

trans-unit.source: A string containing the markup used to render the associated hyperlink control at design time.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém a marcação para compor o controlo de hiperligação associado no momento da concepção.

trans-unit.source: Called when there is a change to the associated control.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando existe uma alteração para o controlo associado.

trans-unit.source: The OnComponentChanged method is called when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged> event of the associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> control is raised.
trans-unit.target: O método OnComponentChanged é chamado quando a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>eventos de associada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink>controlo é gerado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.HyperLink> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.IComponentChangeService.ComponentChanged>

trans-unit.source: Typically, this is in response to a property change on the control (for example, a **Properties** grid change).
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, trata-se em resposta a uma alteração de propriedade no controlo (por exemplo, um **propriedades** alteração de grelha).

trans-unit.source: The OnComponentChanged creates a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs> object, and then calls the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> base method.
trans-unit.target: O OnComponentChanged cria um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs>objeto e, em seguida, as chamadas a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A>base método.</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnComponentChanged%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: The object that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: O objeto que é a origem do evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"></xref> object that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.ComponentChangedEventArgs"> </xref> objeto que contém os dados do evento.
